Airplane

Check with the airline before travelling to determine their specific requirements for packing and transporting.

 

Ammunition must be packed separately from the rifles, and securely in a strong container of wood, metal or fiberboard, plainly marked "ammunition" or in the original inner carton.

 

Quantity must not exceed 5 kg per person for that person's own use. Allowances for more than one per person must not be combined into packages.

 

Ammunition packages must be packed into larger containers or baggage (e.g. suitcase) and must be padded for protection (e.g. wrapped in clothing or soft material).
